title: Candle Day By Day Bible: Children's Bible Stories for Every Day
features: 365 stories make up this daily Bible for 5 - 7 year olds. Each story has a Bible verse, scripture reference and additional notes or questions in the coloured panel down the side of the page, to encourage more detailed use. A warm, classic art style gives this Bible a traditional feel.
description: A Bible story for every day of the year

Juliet David has written many children's stories and Bible activity books. Her other interests include painting, music, and travel to Israel andother Bible lands. This experienced author lives in London with her family.Jane Heyes was educated in the city of Bath, completing her degree at Staffordshire University. Creative from an early age, she surrounded herself with doodles, paintings and drawings - often featuring her pet bassethound. Little has changed. Nature, landscapes, birds and animals are aconstant source of inspiration, adding warmth and humour to her work. Asa successful artist, Jane's work has been published throughout the world, on numerous paper products, textiles and ceramics.
